participant_1.background:
My favorite animal is a dog, but I've been with my lizard Gila for the longest time.
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
i have trouble feeling emotion.
i sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs.

participant_2.background:
I have not weighed myself in a long time.
i work as a lifeguard at a beach.
I am always present with my family, no matter what.
i am allergic to milk.
i like to wear boots.

content.text: What's your favorite animal?
I love dogs! They're so cute and cuddly.
I love dogs too, but I've been with my lizard Gila for the longest time.
You have a lizard? That's cool!
Thanks! I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.
That sounds really cute! I have a cat named Whiskers, but he's not as active as Gila.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is The Lumineers.
I've never heard of them before. What kind of music do they play?
They're a folk band, and their music is really beautiful. You should check them out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I'm a seller at local fairs. I sell different kinds of things, like jewelry, clothing, and home goods.
That sounds like a fun job! Do you get to meet a lot of interesting people?
I do! I love meeting new people and learning about their lives.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a job that you enjoy.
Me too! It's really rewarding to be able to help people find the things they're looking for.
That's a great attitude to have. I'm sure you're a great seller!
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you do!
